creditline: Bequest of Maxine and Kalman S. Goldenberg
description: six pale figures with white hair, wearing dark clothing, seated and standing around a table; another figure emerging from a curtain at right; transparent insect figures in scattered through image; dark interior; Surrealist style
signed: LLC, in white: [Leonora Carrington / March 1955]; bottom center, on book pages, in black: [Dear / Diary, / Never / Since / We / Left / Prague]
title: Dear Diary—Never Since We Left Prague
